CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'OPEN', '1 - OPEN', IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'QUALIFY', '2 - QUALIFY', IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'UPSIDE', '3 - UPSIDE', IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'UPSIDE HIGH', '4 - UPSIDE HIGH', IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'COMITED', '5 - COMITED', IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'WIN', '6 - WIN', IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'LOSS', '7 - LOSS', '')))))))
CustomField.label: Fase*
